      • getEmailMessage

        public String getEmailMessage()
        Gets the message to include in sign request email.
        Returns:
        message of sign request email.

      • setEmailMessage

        public BoxSignRequestCreateParams setEmailMessage(String emailMessage)
        Sets the message to include in sign request email. This is cleaned,but some html tags are allowed. Links included in the message are also converted to actual links in the email. The message may contain the following html tags: a, abbr, acronym, b, blockquote, code, em, i, ul, li, ol, and strong. Be aware that when the text to html ratio is too high, the email may end up in spam filters. Custom styles on these tags are not allowed.
        Parameters:
        emailMessage - included in sign request email.
        Returns:
        this BoxSignRequestCreateParams object for chaining.

      • getAreRemindersEnabled

        public boolean getAreRemindersEnabled()
        Gets the flag indicating if remind for signers to sign a document on day 3, 8, 13 and 18 (or less if the document has been digitally signed already) is enabled.
        Returns:
        true if reminders are enabled, otherwise false.

      • getPrefillTags

        public List<BoxSignRequestPrefillTag> getPrefillTags()
        Gets the list of prefill tags.
        Returns:
        list of prefill tags.

      • setPrefillTags

        public BoxSignRequestCreateParams setPrefillTags(List<BoxSignRequestPrefillTag> prefillTags)
        Sets the list of prefill tags. When a document contains sign related tags in the content, you can prefill them using this prefillTags by referencing the 'id' of the tag as the externalId field of the prefill tag.
        Parameters:
        prefillTags - list for this sign request.
        Returns:
        this BoxSignRequestCreateParams object for chaining.
